document.full_text: at least 100,000 refugees have fled to liberia, while liberian mercenaries are heading in the opposite direction, to take part in the ivorian conflict.
document.title: liberia uneasily linked to ivory coast conflict
lines_and_colors: at least 100,000 refugees have fled to liberia, while liberian mercenaries are heading in the opposite direction, to take part in the ivorian conflict.
